text: 《Catalytic Stereoselective Glycosidation with Glycosyl Diphenyl Phosphates》作者：Miyuki Koshiba 等。本书探讨了高选择性糖苷化反应的催化方法，重点介绍了1,2-顺式α-糖苷键的快速构建技术，适合有机化学和药物化学领域的研究人员阅读。
title: Catalytic Stereoselective Glycosidation with Glycosyl Diphenyl Phosphates
author: Miyuki Koshiba, Noritoshi Suzuki, Ryoichi Arihara, Toshifumi Tsuda, Hisanori Nambu, Seiichi Nakamura, Shunichi Hashimoto
